nodes.name: Core Banking System
nodes.description: Main banking system handling core banking operations, account management, and transactions

nodes.name: Payment Gateway
nodes.description: Handles all payment processing, including card payments, wire transfers, and real-time payments

nodes.name: Customer Portal
nodes.description: Web and mobile banking platform for customer self-service and account management

nodes.name: Risk Management System
nodes.description: Monitors and manages financial risks, compliance, and regulatory reporting

nodes.name: Data Analytics Platform
nodes.description: Big data platform for customer analytics, business intelligence, and reporting

nodes.name: Card Management System
nodes.description: Manages credit and debit card operations, including card issuance, processing, and fraud monitoring

nodes.name: Real-Time Payment System
nodes.description: Handles instant payment processing and settlement between banks and financial institutions

nodes.name: International Payment System
nodes.description: Manages cross-border payments, foreign exchange, and international wire transfers

nodes.name: Payment Reconciliation System
nodes.description: Handles payment reconciliation, settlement, and reporting across different payment channels

nodes.name: Payment Initiation and Execution Service
nodes.description: System for initiating and executing various types of payment transactions

nodes.name: Payment Execution Engine
nodes.description: Executes payment transactions and manages payment workflows, owned by the Payments Team
